markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Demanding Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1073) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Firebrand Braggart](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=24)

**Prerequisites**
[Boaster's Challenge](/Feats.aspx?ID=1068)

</column>

---

If your skill check to challenge a foe is a success, the target of your challenge takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls (or –2 if you critically succeed) until the end of your next turn.
name: Demanding Challenge
